pr_title: #19147 : The evaluation order in Vanity URLs is still being used by s…

timeline.message: #19147 : The evaluation order in Vanity URLs is still being used by several customers. The new version of the Vanity URL API was not setting the expected value for that. The API is now returning the Vanities in ascending order so that users can specify the appropriate way in which Vanities should match an incoming URL.

timeline.bodyText: We should always append e.getMessage() to our message so the real root cause does not get eaten higher up.
timeline.author: wezell

timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: Useless parentheses.
timeline.author: dev-dotcms

timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: JUnit tests should include assert() or fail()
